meta.name: The Loud House
meta.description: Welcome to the Loud House, where life can get pretty crazy. One boy, TEN girls?! Lincoln Loud wouldn't change it for the world!

videos.title: Left in the Dark
videos.overview: When Lincoln wants to watch the finale of his favorite show, he has to beat each sister to get to the couch first!

videos.title: Get the Message
videos.overview: After Lincoln leaves a scathing voicemail on Lori's phone, he realizes he has to erase it before she hears it.

videos.title: Heavy Meddle
videos.overview: Lincoln is tired of his sisters meddling in his business until he's being picked on at school.

videos.title: Making the Case
videos.overview: Lincoln secretly videos his sister's most embarrassing moments in order to win a video contest at school.

videos.title: Along Came a Sister
videos.overview: Lincoln is given the responsibility of taking home his classes' tarantula, but it gets loose and wreaks havoc!

videos.title: Chore and Peace
videos.overview: Thinking he has the worst chores, Lincoln decides to go on strike until someone will swap chores with him.

videos.title: Project Loud House
videos.overview: In order to get his project to school on time, Lincoln works to get each of his sisters out the door during their morning routine.

videos.title: In Tents Debate
videos.overview: The Loud family is planning a vacation and needs a place to go. To avoid the camp grounds, the children pitch ideas for Dairyland Amusement Park or the beach. Their parents let them make the choice where Lincoln is left with the deciding vote.

videos.title: The Sweet Spot
videos.overview: Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip.

videos.title: A Tale of Two Tables
videos.overview: Lincoln tries to prove he's mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

videos.title: Driving Miss Hazy
videos.overview: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test.

videos.title: No Guts, No Glori
videos.overview: Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their "baby"sitter.

videos.title: Picture Perfect
videos.overview: Lincoln plots to take the "perfect" family photo for his parents' anniversary gift.

videos.title: Undie Pressure
videos.overview: Lincoln and his sisters bet on who can go the longest without doing their most annoying habits.

videos.title: Linc or Swim
videos.overview: Lincoln purchases a kiddie pool, and things get out of hand when all 10 of his sisters want to use it.

videos.title: Hand-Me-Downer
videos.overview: After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynn's cool BMX bike without telling her.

videos.title: Sleuth or Consequences
videos.overview: Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

videos.title: Changing the Baby
videos.overview: After noticing that none of his sisters share his interests, Lincoln attempts to mold Lily into his mini-me.

videos.title: Sound of Silence
videos.overview: Lincoln buys a pair of noise-cancelling earbuds to drown out the noise his sisters' make.

videos.title: Space Invader
videos.overview: After an argument with Lucy, Lynn is allowed by Lincoln to bunk in his room for the night, but overstays her welcome.

videos.title: For Bros About to Rock
videos.overview: When Lincoln and Clyde head off to their first concert, Luna tags along, hoping to make the experience a great one.

videos.title: Ties that Bind
videos.overview: After eavesdropping on his parents, Lincoln thinks they have decided to get rid of their kids!

videos.title: The Green House
videos.overview: In an effort to be more energy-efficient, Lincoln rallies his family to stop using so much electricity.

videos.title: The Butterfly Effect
videos.overview: After spilling an experiment of Lisa's, Lincoln sets off a chain reaction that unravels the household.

videos.title: It's a Loud, Loud, Loud, Loud, House
videos.overview: When Lincoln finds a note in the attic that suggests there's a lot of money hidden somewhere in the house, he and his sisters try to find it.

videos.title: House Music
videos.overview: Lincoln signs his family up for a talent show and they form a band.

videos.title: Two Boys and a Baby
videos.overview: Thinking it'll be easy, Lincoln and Clyde take on the task of babysitting the youngest Loud, Lily.

videos.title: Overnight Success
videos.overview: Lincoln invites Clyde to a sleepover, but gets jealous when Clyde wants to hang out with his sisters.

videos.title: Toads and Tiaras
videos.overview: After Lola gets injured and can't compete in her pageant, Lincoln coaches Lana to take her place.

videos.title: A Novel Idea
videos.overview: It's Dad's annual Take Your Daughter to Work Day so Mom offers to take Lincoln to her work: a dental office.

videos.title: Cover Girls
videos.overview: When all 10 of Lincoln's sisters ask him to cover for them on the same day, Lincoln has his hands full.

videos.title: Out On A Limo
videos.overview: Lincoln wins a ride in a limo and starts to change after soaking up the good life.

videos.title: Attention Deficit
videos.overview: Lincoln starts spending time at Clyde's house after Clyde's dads give Lincoln more attention than he gets at home.

videos.title: Save the Date
videos.overview: After a hurtful misunderstanding, Lori and Lincoln go on a double date with Bobby and his sister, Ronnie Anne.

videos.title: Come Sale Away
videos.overview: It's time for the Loud family annual garage sale, and every kid is determined to out-sell the others.

videos.title: Lincoln Loud: Girl Guru
videos.overview: For a class assignment, Lincoln and Clyde must start a business, so they decide to sell Lincoln's girl expertise.

videos.title: Roughin' It
videos.overview: Lincoln is worried that he's lost his manliness from growing up with all sisters, so he and Clyde go camping.

videos.title: The Waiting Game
videos.overview: Lincoln gets Lori a job at a pizza arcade, but when he starts to ask favors of her, Lori gets in hot water.

videos.title: The Loudest Yard
videos.overview: When Rita signs Lincoln up for peewee football, he schemes to have Lynn take his spot.

videos.title: Dance Dance Resolution
videos.overview: It's the Sadie Hawkins dance at school and Lincoln's sisters have accidentally landed him four dates!

videos.title: A Fair to Remember
videos.overview: When Lincoln and Bobby become friends, Lori sets out to make Bobby jealous by hanging out with Clyde.

videos.title: A Tattler's Tale
videos.overview: Lola wants to be a part of the siblings' secrets club, but they won't let her in because she's a "tattle tale."

videos.title: Homespun
videos.overview: The kids complain about their house, but when a tornado threatens to destroy it, they start to feel differently.

videos.title: April Fools Rules
videos.overview: Every April Fool's Day, Luan pranks the entire household, but this year, Lincoln has a plan to not get pranked.

videos.title: The Price of Admission
videos.overview: After seeing a scary movie (that his parents told him not to), Lincoln can't go to sleep and pulls an all-nighter.

videos.title: One Flu Over the Loud House
videos.overview: When a common cold ravages through the loud house, Lincoln believes his sisters have turned into Zombies!

videos.title: One of the Boys
videos.overview: Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality.

videos.title: Cereal Offender
videos.overview: The Loud children make a trip to the supermarket to do the grocery shopping for their mother, but Lincoln has other plans.

videos.title: Raw Deal
videos.overview: Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac when Lucy reads his fortune and predicts that his day will end in disaster.

videos.title: Study Muffin
videos.overview: All of Lincoln's sisters develop a crush on his new tutor, making it impossible for Lincoln to study.

videos.title: Funny Business
videos.overview: Lincoln begins to hog the spotlight when he becomes Luan's clown assistant.

videos.title: Snow Bored
videos.overview: The Loud children have fun on a snow day.

videos.title: Intern for the Worse
videos.overview: When Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship at Flip's, they compete to win the title of manager.

videos.title: The Old and the Restless
videos.overview: After seeing how tame Pop Pop has gotten in his advanced age, Lincoln takes him out for a day to remember.

videos.title: 11 Louds a Leapin'
videos.overview: The Louds are getting ready for Christmas when the unthinkable happens to Lincoln - his sled goes in the neighbor's yard! Lincoln and Clyde attempt to pull off a sled-rescue-mission and end up finding secrets about Mr. Grouse.

videos.title: Suite and Sour
videos.overview: After Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort, they decide to take the kids - but only because they promised to behave.

videos.title: Baby Steps
videos.overview: When Clyde thinks his parents are having another baby he goes to Lincoln for help on how to be a great big brother.

videos.title: Brawl in the Family
videos.overview: When Lori and Leni both buy the same dress, a fight breaks out leading to Defcon five in the Loud house.

videos.title: Back in Black
videos.overview: When Lucy gets a crush on a "regular and normal" boy, her sisters give her a makeover.

videos.title: The Whole Picture
videos.overview: When Lincoln accidentally erases his childhood photos, he & Clyde try to recreate them before Lincoln forgets.

videos.title: Lock 'N Loud
videos.overview: After Dad gets upset with the kids for never locking the front door, the kids take home security to the next level.

videos.title: Vantastic Voyage
videos.overview: Sick of their family van always falling apart, the kids decide to try and trick Dad into buying a cool new van.

videos.title: Making the Grade
videos.overview: When Lincoln's four-year-old sister, Lisa, gets put into his 5th grade class, his social standing is at stake!

videos.title: No Such Luck
videos.overview: The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck so they ban him from attending their activities.

videos.title: Frog Wild
videos.overview: When Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them.

videos.title: Patching Things Up
videos.overview: Lola and Lana try out for Bluebell Scouts but discover one of them might be more suited for it.

videos.title: Cheater by the Dozen
videos.overview: When Lincoln and Clyde think Bobby is cheating on Lori they follow him around town gathering evidence.

videos.title: Kick the Bucket List
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde's spring break plans are put in jeopardy when they only have one day to complete their list.

videos.title: Party Down
videos.overview: Lori throws a sophisticated party, but it backfires when her guests don't like what she's planned.

videos.title: Fed Up
videos.overview: Tired of monotonous meals, the kids make a plan to sabotage dinner so they can have pizza.

videos.title: Shell Shock
videos.overview: Lincoln and Ronnie Anne have to take care of an egg baby, but Lincoln doesn't trust her with the fragile egg.

videos.title: Pulp Friction
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde submit an Ace Savvy comic to a meet-the-creator contest, but are foiled by a surprising nemesis.

videos.title: Pets Peeved
videos.overview: When Lana brings home a new pet, who the kids adore, the four original Loud pets scheme to get rid of him.

videos.title: Out of the Picture
videos.overview: Afraid they'll be forgotten, Lincoln and Clyde want to make a splash in the yearbook and crash group photos.

videos.title: Room with a Feud
videos.overview: Seeing his sisters fight with their roommates, Lincoln suggests a room shuffle based on a compatibility test.

videos.title: Spell it Out
videos.overview: Tired of her siblings walking all over her, Lucy turns to a spell book once to teach her siblings a lesson.

videos.title: The Loudest Mission: Relative Chaos
videos.overview: Ronnie Anne and Bobby visit their crazy, chaotic extended family. Bobby fits in great but Ronnie Anne struggles with the smothering nature of their relatives. Little do they know, their mother has a secret motive.

videos.title: Back Out There
videos.overview: Clyde, worried that Lincoln is hung up on Ronnie Anne, tries to cure his post-breakup blues.

videos.title: Fool's Paradise
videos.overview: With prankster Luan away at camp for April Fool's Day, the Louds think they should be safe.

videos.title: Potty Mouth
videos.overview: When the kids hear Lily curse, they're worried they have been a bad influence on her.

videos.title: L is for Love
videos.overview: A love letter addressed to "L" Loud shows up at the house and the family has to figure out who it was meant for.

videos.title: ARGGH! You For Real?
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde find out that ARGGH! is coming to town and decide to go to the taping.

videos.title: Garage Banned
videos.overview: Tired of her siblings, Lori moves to the garage, but quickly finds it's more than she bargained for.

videos.title: Job Insecurity
videos.overview: The kids discover Dad isn't at his old job anymore and worry it might be their fault.

videos.title: Change of Heart
videos.overview: Clyde, desperate to learn how to act normal around Lori, enlists Leni's help.

videos.title: Health Kicked
videos.overview: Worried that Mom and Dad are hurting their health from not being active, the kids encourage them to exercise.

videos.title: Lynner Takes All
videos.overview: Tired of Lynn's poor sportsmanship during board games, the siblings decide to team up to take her down.

videos.title: Future Tense
videos.overview: When Mom and Dad meet an impressive family they worry their kids aren't doing enough to ensure successful futures.

videos.title: Yes Man
videos.overview: The sisters enlist the "Master of Convincing" (AKA Lincoln) to teach them how to ask Mom and Dad for money.

videos.title: Friend or Faux?
videos.overview: Lisa gets her report card and finds she's failed "social skills". To bring up her grade, she must make a friend.

videos.title: No Laughing Matter
videos.overview: When Luan overhears her siblings complaining about her comedy, she decides to give it up..

videos.title: Tricked!
videos.overview: For Halloween, Lincoln and Clyde have scoped out a fancy neighborhood to make their dreams of scoring full size candy bars a reality. Meanwhile, Lucy is putting on a haunted maze and the younger girls scheme to get maximum candy.

videos.title: No Spoilers
videos.overview: Knowing Leni's history of spoiling surprises, the kids don't tell her about Mom's upcoming party.

videos.title: Read Aloud
videos.overview: The family embarks on a reading challenge at the library, but Lola refuses to participate.

videos.title: Not a Loud
videos.overview: When Lincoln discovers the first page of his baby book is blank, he worries his parents are hiding something.

videos.title: Legends
videos.overview: Dad and Lincoln get on "Legends of the Hidden Temple" and can't wait to for a day of bonding. Guest Stars: Jace Norman, Cooper Barnes

videos.title: Mall of Duty
videos.overview: Lincoln wants to go to the mall but has to watch his younger sisters so he decides to take them with him.

videos.title: The Crying Dame
videos.overview: To get Lily to stop crying the kids give her an old singing toy from the attic but it quickly drives them crazy.

videos.title: Anti Social
videos.overview: Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they decide to show Dad how great electronics and the internet are.

videos.title: Snow Way Out
videos.overview: Lana convinces the kids go to the Burpin' Burger to meet her racecar driving hero despite the heavy snowfall.

videos.title: Snow Way Down
videos.overview: When Lincoln goes on vacation with Clyde he realizes just how overprotective Clyde's Dads are.

videos.title: Selfie Improvement
videos.overview: When Carol Pingrey's photo gets more likes on social media than Lori's she tries to one-up her.

videos.title: No Place Like Homeschool
videos.overview: Lola is being temporarily homeschooled. Thinking it looks like fun, the other kids try to get in on it.

videos.title: White Hare
videos.overview: Lincoln has a plan for introducing himself to a new girl, but when the sisters catch him he has to avoid them.

videos.title: Insta-Gran
videos.overview: Pop Pop introduces his new girlfriend to the family. She seems great until she starts showing up unannounced. Guest Star: Jennifer Coolidge

videos.title: City Slickers
videos.overview: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed.

videos.title: Fool Me Twice
videos.overview: The family has a new plan to dodge Luan's April Fool's Day pranking: stunt doubles.

videos.title: Net Gains
videos.overview: Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship but gets drafted onto a terrible team.

videos.title: Pipe Dreams
videos.overview: Mom and Dad are sick of waiting in the long bathroom line so they decide to build a secret bathroom.

videos.title: Rita Her Rights
videos.overview: After racking up tickets, Mom finds it more relaxing to perform community service than be at home.

videos.title: Teachers' Union
videos.overview: To try and make gym class better, Lincoln and Clyde set Coach Pacowski and Mrs. Johnson up.

videos.title: Head Poet's Anxiety
videos.overview: Luan mentors Lucy, teaching her how to manage the ups and downs of pursuing a life in the arts.

videos.title: The Mad Scientist
videos.overview: Lisa gets invited to work at an institute and get away from her crazy family.

videos.title: Deal Me Out
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde worry that they may be too old to still be playing Ace Savvy.

videos.title: Friendzy
videos.overview: Lincoln discovers that having a friend over means getting special privileges, and he takes advantage of that.

videos.title: Tripped!
videos.overview: During a road trip to their vacation destination, everything that can go wrong for the family does.

videos.title: Pasture Bedtime
videos.overview: The boys struggle with whether to attend Liam's barn sleepover or Girl Jordan's awesome pool party.

videos.title: Shop Girl
videos.overview: The kids worry that Leni is too weak and they try to teach her how to be more aggressive.

videos.title: What Wood Lincoln Do?
videos.overview: Lincoln has to complete a woodworking assignment, but has a history of failure on the topic.

videos.title: Ruthless People
videos.overview: When the house is infested with termites, half the family stays with Pop Pop and the others with Aunt Ruth.

videos.title: Scales of Justice
videos.overview: When Lana learns her favorite fish are in jeopardy of losing their home to construction she springs into action.

videos.title: Crimes of Fashion
videos.overview: When Leni gets fired from her job due to missing scarves, Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) take on the case.

videos.title: Breaking Dad
videos.overview: Dad has Mr. Grouse watch Lily while he goes to a concert but things quickly start to go wrong.

videos.title: Absent Minded
videos.overview: Clyde discovers he didn't earn junior administrator job. But can he give up the perks that come along with it?

videos.title: Gown and Out
videos.overview: When Lola advances to a regional pageant she worries she could lose for the first time.

videos.title: Be Stella My Heart
videos.overview: When the new girl starts hanging around Lincoln and his friends, they begin to suspect she likes one of them.

videos.title: House Of Lies
videos.overview: After witnessing an excess of lying in the family, Lisa invents lie-detecting glasses to try and curb the fibs.

videos.title: Game Boys
videos.overview: Lincoln asks to borrow Clyde's new gaming system, but Clyde struggles to trust that it's safe with him.

videos.title: Sitting Bull
videos.overview: The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive.

videos.title: The Spies Who Loved Me
videos.overview: Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

videos.title: Missed Connection
videos.overview: Lori and Bobby worry that dating long-distance is causing them to lose their connection.

videos.title: Everybody Loves Leni
videos.overview: Torn between her work friends and her school friends, Leni tries to bring everyone together.

videos.title: Middle Men
videos.overview: When Lincoln and Clyde go to tour the middle school, Lynn gives them some questionable advice.

videos.title: Jeers for Fears
videos.overview: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears.

videos.title: Tea Tale Heart
videos.overview: Lola discovers Lucy has an old, fragile doll and decides she must borrow it â€“ no matter what Lucy says.

videos.title: The Loudest Thanksgiving
videos.overview: Faced with spending Thanksgiving apart, Lori and Bobby try to bring their crazy families together for the first time.

videos.title: Really Loud Music
videos.overview: Hoping to win a song-writing contest, Luna contemplates whether she should go with a song that's true to her sound or try to make something that the whole world will love.

videos.title: Predict Ability
videos.overview: After discovering he has rituals, Lincoln worries he's predictable and vows to change it up.

videos.title: Driving Ambition
videos.overview: When Lori finds out that the golf coach from her dream college is coming to see her play, she develops the yips.

videos.title: Home of the Fave
videos.overview: After a pun-filled trip to the grocery store with Luan and Lola, Dad worries Lola thinks he plays favorites.

videos.title: Hero Today, Gone Tomorrow
videos.overview: When Lynn's friend Margo is celebrated for a one-in-a-million soccer goal, Lynn has to try and be supportive.

videos.title: Cooked!
videos.overview: The kids promise to help Dad with the grand opening of his new restaurant by coming up with promotions. But their lack of teamwork and crazy promos lead to an ultimate nightmare in the kitchen for Dad.

videos.title: The Write Stuff
videos.overview: When Lucy quits the writing club at school due to the by-the-book way Huggins runs the club, Rita decides to take over.

videos.title: Racing Hearts
videos.overview: When Luna and Sam embark on a challenge taking place across Royal Woods, they discover they have less in common than they thought.

videos.title: Stage Plight
videos.overview: Hoping to get closer to her crush, Benny, Luan tries out for the school play.

videos.title: Antiqued Off
videos.overview: When Clyde and schoolmate Zach bond over antiques, Lincoln finds himself feeling like a third wheel.

videos.title: Friended! with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: Ronnie Anne makes friends with Sid, a girl whose family wants to rent the apartment upstairs. When it looks like another couple might get it first, the girls resort to sabotage to try and dissuade them.

videos.title: Power Play with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: When a high utility bill threatens Hector and Rosa's annual trip, Ronnie Anne spearheads an effort to lower usage.

videos.title: Room for Improvement with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: Desperate for their own space, Ronnie Anne and Sid find a hidden room and try to keep it from the other tenants.

videos.title: Roll Model with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: When Carl witnesses Ronnie Anne save a dog, he becomes obsessed with being just like his newfound hero.

videos.title: No Show with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: Ronnie Anne secretly starts watching her family's favorite telenovela after refusing to watch it with them.

videos.title: Face the Music with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: When Ronnie Anne discovers that each family member will perform at Hector's birthday, she turns to Sid for help.

videos.title: Pranks for the Memories with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: Ronnie Anne's attempts to bond with her cool older cousin Carlota lead to a prank war against the boy cousins.

videos.title: Store Wars with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: When a fancy grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete.

videos.title: Lucha Fever with the Casagrandes
videos.overview: Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lucha Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

videos.title: Washed Up
videos.overview: The Louds rent a boat for a relaxing day trip on the lake, but the family ends up marooned on a desert island.

videos.title: Recipe for Disaster
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) investigate when they discover a frozen food company using Dad's recipes. Guest Star: Philece Sampler

videos.title: Present Tense
videos.overview: Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift.

videos.title: Any Given Sundae
videos.overview: Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters.

videos.title: A Grave Mistake
videos.overview: Lucy faces off against her friend Haiku to become the new president of the Young Morticians' Club at school.

videos.title: Leader of the Rack
videos.overview: Leni is promoted to temporary manager at work, but she worries about remaining good friends with Miguel and Fiona.

videos.title: Kings of the Con
videos.overview: Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

videos.title: Tails of Woe
videos.overview: When Stella's music box disappears at school, the gang immediately suspects the Rat Beast, a student urban legend.

videos.title: Last Loud on Earth
videos.overview: After a night of zombie movies, Clyde and Lincoln find an empty Loud house and assume it's a zombie apocalypse.

videos.title: Can't Hardly Wait
videos.overview: Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated.

videos.title: A Mutt Above
videos.overview: Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

videos.title: Love Birds
videos.overview: After Walt's failed attempt at romance, Charles, Cliff and Geo try to find their pal a love connection.

videos.title: Rocket Men
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde beg their parents to let them go to space cadets camp, but it's not as fun as they expected.

videos.title: Stall Monitor
videos.overview: Worried that his teacher has bad things to say about him, Lincoln tries to delay his parent-teacher conference.

videos.title: A Pimple Plan
videos.overview: Luan wakes up with a pimple on the day of her first date with Benny, so she turns to the siblings for help.

videos.title: Good Sports
videos.overview: Lynn finds an unexpected TV sports watching buddy in the family's next-door neighbor, Mr. Grouse.

videos.title: Geri-Antics
videos.overview: When Lisa realizes that Pop Pop won't be around forever, she turns to science to ensure his longevity. Guest Stars: Fred Willard, Jennifer Coolidge

videos.title: Exchange of Heart
videos.overview: To divert the attention of his helicopter dads, Clyde arranges for an exchange student to stay with them.

videos.title: Community Disservice
videos.overview: Lola takes a new timid classmate under her wing and gives her a social butterfly transformation.

videos.title: Deep Cuts
videos.overview: When Luna discovers that the high school music club will be axed due do budget cuts, she leads a protest.

videos.title: Game Off
videos.overview: Desperate to play Lincoln's trash-themed video game, Lana conspires to distract her brother away from the console.

videos.title: Singled Out
videos.overview: Feeling like a third wheel when her teammates find significant others, Lynn seeks a boyfriend just to fit in.

videos.title: Brave the Last Dance
videos.overview: Clyde recruits Lincoln and the gang to find out if a girl he has a crush on at school feels the same about him.

videos.title: Write and Wrong
videos.overview: Mom tries to convince a newspaper editor that her kids are perfect in order to land a parenting advice column job.

videos.title: Purrfect Gig
videos.overview: When the McBrides go out of town, they hire Luna to catsitâ€”but the job becomes more demanding than she imagined.

videos.title: Sister Act
videos.overview: To get out of doing things they don't like, Lana and Lola secretly switch places and pretend to be the other.

videos.title: House Flip
videos.overview: After causing Flip to get hurt, the kids sneak him into the attic to care for him without Mom and Dad knowing.

videos.title: Don't You Fore-get About Me
videos.overview: Hit by the realization that her big sister will be going off to college soon, Leni tries to thwart Lori's plans.

videos.title: Tough Cookies
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde start their own cookie-making business, but realize it's a lot more work than they realized.

videos.title: A Dark and Story Night
videos.overview: When the lights go out in the Loud House, the kids entertain themselves by taking turns telling parts of a story.

videos.title: Feast or Family
videos.overview: When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

videos.title: On Thin Ice
videos.overview: Lynn's extreme sports superstitions cause chaos at a professional hockey match.

videos.title: Room and Hoard
videos.overview: Unable to part with their childhood toys, the kids try to convince Mom and Dad that they still play with them.

videos.title: A Star is Scorned
videos.overview: When Lola realizes that double the cuteness could help her break into show business, she teams up with Lily.

videos.title: Senior Moment
videos.overview: Lori regrets everything she hasn't done in high school, and vows to make up for lost time in her senior year.

videos.title: Sand Hassles
videos.overview: Lucy and the Morticians' Club try to thwart plans for a school field trip to the beach.

videos.title: Wheel and Deal
videos.overview: Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby.

videos.title: How Double Dare You!
videos.overview: The siblings turn to Lisa's genius to help them land a spot on "Double Dare." Guest Star: Marc Summers

videos.title: Snoop's On
videos.overview: After secretly reading Luna's diary, Leni and Lincoln become worried about the exploits their sister writes about.

videos.title: Friends in Dry Places
videos.overview: While on a field trip, Lincoln worries that his friend group is splintering.

videos.title: Coupe Dreams
videos.overview: In order to buy her dream car, Lori becomes a local rideshare driver.

videos.title: Schooled!
videos.overview: Lincoln tries to swap middle school classes after being separated from the gang, but ends up being transferred to Canada. Lori doesn't fit in on any of the college dorm floors. Mom and Dad rush to potty train Lily for preschool.

videos.title: The Boss Maybe
videos.overview: Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter.

videos.title: Family Bonding
videos.overview: Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

videos.title: Strife of the Party
videos.overview: When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it.

videos.title: Kernel of Truth
videos.overview: Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

videos.title: Ghosted!
videos.overview: With the help of Lincoln and Clyde, Lori banishes a ghost she believes is haunting her. But, when Fairway's golf team starts to struggle, Lori realizes she has to bring it back to turn the team's luck around.

videos.title: Blinded By Science
videos.overview: After searching for her next big scientific breakthrough, Lisa discovers Flip is a marvel of modern science.

videos.title: Band Together
videos.overview: Luna has to decide between playing in a band with her friends or with playing with professionals.

videos.title: Season's Cheatings
videos.overview: Lincoln tries to game the family gift swap and ends up learning a valuable lesson.

videos.title: A Flipmas Carol
videos.overview: A Scrooge-like Flip is visited by three ghosts in a take on "A Christmas Carol."

videos.title: Cow Pie Kid
videos.overview: Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team.

videos.title: Saved by the Spell
videos.overview: Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

videos.title: No Bus No Fuss
videos.overview: Lincoln and his friends try to find another way to get to school after a run-in with the 8th grade bullies on the bus.

videos.title: Resident Upheaval
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde are at odds when they discover there's only room for one of their grandmas at Sunset Canyon.

videos.title: School of Shock
videos.overview: Lisa takes over her first-grade classroom and learns that there's more to teaching than just knowing facts.

videos.title: Electshunned
videos.overview: Leni goes toe-to-toe with the Mayor in a city-wide Royal Woods election.

videos.title: Zach Attack
videos.overview: Zach and Rusty fake an alien landing that sends the whole town on a hunt for little green men.

videos.title: Flying Solo
videos.overview: Clyde thinks he's a shoe-in for the Glee Club solo, until Lincoln accidentally auditions and lands the part.

videos.title: Silence of the Luans
videos.overview: With Luan locked in a cell in the basement, who is responsible for the April Fool's Day pranks this year?

videos.title: Undercover Mom
videos.overview: Mom goes undercover as a student at the high school and becomes BFFs with Leni, Luna and Luan.

videos.title: Hurl, Interrupted
videos.overview: Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret.

videos.title: Diamonds Are for Never
videos.overview: After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

videos.title: Rumor Has It
videos.overview: Lincoln and the gang are trapped in the woods with Mr. Bolhofner, who may not be who he says he is.

videos.title: Training Day
videos.overview: Lana gets more than she bargained for when she takes on Stella's untrainable new bunny.

videos.title: Director's Rut
videos.overview: Luan turns to Mr. Coconuts for help after she struggles to direct her school's play.

videos.title: Friday Night Fights
videos.overview: Lisa joins Lynn's football team as the analytics coach to prove that math will always beat out heart.

videos.title: Grub Snub
videos.overview: When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Gus's, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control.

videos.title: She's All Bat
videos.overview: Lucy gets jealous of Lola's newfound attention after she joins the Mortician's Club.

videos.title: Camped!
videos.overview: When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. They soon uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it and prove the existence of an old camp legend.

videos.title: Dad Reputation
videos.overview: While playing in her Dad's new band, Luna is worried about her reputation if her friends see her perform.

videos.title: In the Mick of Time
videos.overview: After embellishing her friendship with Mick Swagger, Luna must try to convince the star to perform at her high-school dance.

videos.title: Much Ado About Noshing
videos.overview: The kids help Dad track down the mysterious person who left Lynn's Table a bad review.

videos.title: Broadcast Blues
videos.overview: The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

videos.title: Lori Days
videos.overview: Lori makes a surprise visit to the house when she feels like she's missing out on the inside jokes.

videos.title: Dream a Lily Dream
videos.overview: Lisa discovers the only way to stop Lily's nightmares is to go inside her dreams and fight them herself.

videos.title: Fright Bite
videos.overview: When a vampire moves into Royal Woods, Lucy must convince him to turn the Mortician's Club into vampires.

videos.title: Animal House
videos.overview: Lana struggles to find homes for the exotic pets at the Royal Woods Animal Shelter, before they're moved out.

videos.title: Fam Scam
videos.overview: Embarrassed by her family, Lola pretends to be a McBride to impress her new sophisticated pageant friend.

videos.title: Farm to Unstable
videos.overview: After realizing farm work with Liam is harder than they thought, Lincoln and the gang look for shortcuts.

videos.title: Diss the Cook
videos.overview: Lincoln is convinced the middle school lunch lady is holding a grudge against him and his older sisters

videos.title: For Sale by Loner
videos.overview: Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds.

videos.title: The Loudly Bones
videos.overview: Lisa discovers that the dinosaur bones she found in her backyard may not be what they seem.

videos.title: How the Best Was Won
videos.overview: The gang splits up, competing for the title of Middle School's Best Friends, creating a rift between the group.

videos.title: High Crimes
videos.overview: Sunset Canyon is falling apart and Lincoln and Clyde are determined to find out why... David Steele style.

videos.title: Appetite for Destruction
videos.overview: When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause.

videos.title: Frame on You
videos.overview: When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

videos.title: Don't Escor-go
videos.overview: When Clyde has an opportunity to study cooking in France, the gang tries to keep him closer to home.

videos.title: Double Trouble
videos.overview: Lola and Lana take on Cheryl and Meryl to be crowned the new twin spokespeople for Auntie Pam's Parlor.

videos.title: Flip This Flip
videos.overview: The Loud kids help Flip clean up his image to impress his middle school crush.

videos.title: Haunted House Call
videos.overview: When the Mortician's Club can't afford tickets to Casket Con, they decide to start a business to raise money.

videos.title: Musical Chairs
videos.overview: Lincoln convinces his teacher, Mr. Bolhofner, to join the Doo-Dads in order to get a better seat in class.

videos.title: The Taunting Hour
videos.overview: After Lincoln tries to help Lynn get over a heckler at her soccer game, the Louds realize they all have critics.

videos.title: A Bug's Strife
videos.overview: Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house.

videos.title: All the Rage
videos.overview: Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

videos.title: Scoop Snoop
videos.overview: The Action News Team struggles to find out how Katherine Mulligan is scooping their news leads.

videos.title: Eye Can't
videos.overview: Trying to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes a new pair of glasses that actually makes her eyesight worse.

videos.title: Dine and Bash
videos.overview: After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs.

videos.title: Sofa, So Good
videos.overview: The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning

videos.title: Present Danger
videos.overview: Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed.

videos.title: Stressed for the Part
videos.overview: After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

videos.title: Time Trap!
videos.overview: When the kids break Mom and Dad's priceless vase, they decide the only thing to do is go back in time to their wedding day, and prevent them from ever receiving it.

videos.title: Bummer Camp
videos.overview: When Gramps struggles to run Camp Mastadon, the kids come to his rescue.

videos.title: Sleepstakes
videos.overview: The Loud kids help Lana get over her fear of sleepovers.

videos.title: The Last Laugh
videos.overview: Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act.

videos.title: Driver's Dread
videos.overview: Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni looks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

videos.title: Cat-astrophe
videos.overview: The McBrides scramble to put together a birthday party for Nana Gayle after they forget to throw one this year.

videos.title: Prize Fighter
videos.overview: Lola worries she's already a washed-up pageant star when she wins a lifetime achievement award.

videos.title: Save Royal Woods!
videos.overview: When Royal Woods is in danger of being flooded to make room for a sixth Great Lake, the town comes together to prove that they're worth saving.

videos.title: Puns and Buns
videos.overview: Benny struggles to rein in Luan and her practical jokes when she becomes his coworker at the Burpin' Burger

videos.title: Food Courting
videos.overview: When Leni realizes Miguel has a crush on Gavin, the new food court employee, she sets out to help Miguel woo him.

videos.title: Lights, Camera, Nuclear Reaction
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde's David Steele movie turns high-stakes when Lisa builds a nuclear reactor.

videos.title: Save the Last Pants
videos.overview: Rusty tries to bring the fun of Gus's to Duds For Dudes when he's in charge of the store.

videos.title: Hiccups and Downs
videos.overview: Luna needs to get rid of a nasty case of the hiccups before a big rock competition.

videos.title: The Loathe Boat
videos.overview: The Morticians Club plan Bertrand's escape from the cruise ship his parents work on

videos.title: Crashed Course
videos.overview: The Loud siblings intervene when they think Lori is failing out of Fairway U.

videos.title: A Stella Performance
videos.overview: Stella wins a school competition and is super excited â€“ until she learns she has to give a public presentation.

videos.title: Cheer Pressure
videos.overview: The cheerleaders challenge Lynn and her teammates to a "cheer off" when Lynn dismisses them as athletes.

videos.title: Stroke of Luck
videos.overview: Lori becomes a celebrity at school when she hits a hole- in-one on a notoriously difficult course.

videos.title: Space Jammed
videos.overview: Annoyed by Leni's intrusive babysitting, Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space.

videos.title: Crown and Dirty
videos.overview: Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant

videos.title: The Orchid Grief
videos.overview: When Lincoln and Clyde overwater Howard's rare orchid, the two embark on an adventure to replace it.

videos.title: Forks and Knives Out
videos.overview: Lynn Sr. is stoked to compete on a televised cooking show until he learns he's up against Rosa Casagrande

videos.title: The Loud Cloud
videos.overview: Tired of Mom's sticky note system, Lincoln and Lisa create an app to keep track of the family's schedule.

videos.title: You Auto Know Better
videos.overview: Lana creates an auto-body shop to try and buy a new bike, but her shop turns corrupt when Flip becomes her mentor.

videos.title: Great Lakes Freakout!
videos.overview: The Louds team up with the Casagrandes for a Halloween storefront decorating competition, but things get out of hand when they use Lucy's spell book to make the mercado extra spooky.

videos.title: Snow Escape
videos.overview: To make it to school, the Louds must survive a monstrous Lynn when the weatherman declares it a "Packing Day."

videos.title: Snow News Day
videos.overview: When there are signs of a yeti in Royal Woods, the Action News Team sets out to prove its existence.

videos.title: Pop Pop the Question
videos.overview: When the kids discover Myrtle has a shady past, they try to expose her before Pop Pop proposes.

videos.title: Lynn and Order
videos.overview: Lynn and Liam butt heads when they're forced to partner up as the middle school hall monitors.

videos.title: Day of the Dad
videos.overview: Lori struggles to make a good impression on Bobby's dad after accidentally pushing him into a puddle.

videos.title: Small Blunder
videos.overview: Desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school.

videos.title: Fashion No Show
videos.overview: Leni and Carlota's working styles clash when they are both interning for a famous fashion designer, Mariella Moss.

videos.title: Doom Service
videos.overview: The Louds book a stay at an all-inclusive resort, only to find the vacation is not what they imagined.

videos.title: The Hurt Lockers
videos.overview: When a sinkhole opens up at school, Lincoln and his classmates are forced to share lockers.

videos.title: Love Stinks
videos.overview: When Lana brings home a skunk to rehabilitate, Lola grows attached when she finds the skunk has finer tastes.

videos.title: Waking History
videos.overview: Eager to uncover secrets from the past, Lisa uses her technology to wake up a frozen caveman.

videos.title: Pranks Fore Nothing
videos.overview: To win the prank war between Fairway University and their rival Par College, Lori recruits the help of Luan.

videos.title: Child's Play
videos.overview: Luna and the Moon Goats try to become a kiddie band in order to raise enough money for new equipment.

videos.title: Force of Habits
videos.overview: When Leni mentions an annoying habit of her new boyfriend Gavin, Lori and Luna start to notice their partners' habits.

videos.title: Candy Crushed
videos.overview: Lola struggles to dampen her sweet tooth when mom challenges her to go an entire week without added sugar.

videos.title: Master of Delusion
videos.overview: Lincoln strives to impress the Amazing Brailster when he's chosen to be his assistant at the Illusion Chateau.

videos.title: Road Trip: Bringing Down the House
Road Trip: From Brad to Worse
Twas the Fight Before Christmas
videos.overview: Lincoln recruits his cousins to help end the years-long feud between Dad and Uncle Lance so they can finally celebrate Christmas together.

videos.title: An Inspector Falls
videos.overview: When Luan is cast as the lead role and detective in her school play, she ends up having to solve a real case when a mystery unfolds.

videos.title: One in a Million
videos.overview: Lincoln and Clyde are determined to be Flip's millionth customer when they learn there is a big reward.

videos.title: Let's Break a Deal
videos.overview: Rusty strikes a deal with Morpheus that for a seemingly small price, Morpheus will cast spells for him.

videos.title: A Dish Come True
videos.overview: Lincoln starts to work at Dad's restaurant when he hears that the best employee wins a dish named in their honor.

videos.title: Beg, Borrow and Steele
videos.overview: Lincoln becomes indebted to Lola when he asks her for money to try and attain a rare David Steele collectible.

videos.title: There Will Be Mud
videos.overview: When the Hunnicutts strike it rich overnight, they try to fit in a fancy neighborhood for the super wealthy.

videos.title: Riddle School
videos.overview: The Action News team springs into action to figure out who is behind a mysterious string of pranks.

videos.title: Love Me Tenor
videos.overview: When Lincoln and friends discover Gus has a hidden talent, they work together to help him live out his dream.

videos.title: Be Careful What You Fish For
Only Mime Will Tell
videos.overview: For her try-out for the Varsity Mime Team, Luan must be silent for an entire day.

videos.title: The Winning Spirit
videos.overview: Afraid of failing her PE exam again, Lucy recruits the Morticians Club to help her pass.

videos.title: InTODDnito
videos.overview: Lisa sends Todd in her place to attend Darcy's birthday party.

videos.title: Weather or Not
videos.overview: Flip sees a lucrative business opportunity when he discovers Nacho can predict the weather.

videos.title: Close Encounters of the Nerd Kind
Europe Road Trip: A Knight to Remember
videos.overview: The Louds travel to London when Luna receives an invitation to Mick Swagger's knighting ceremony but get caught up in a special mission when Lincoln runs into a familiar face.
